DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this phase III study is to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Oral Salmon Calcitonin in the Treatment of Patients with Osteoarthritis of the Knee
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Oral Salmon Calcitonin in Patients With Knee Osteoarthritis (OA 2 Study)
DOC.criteria: Medical history and symptoms of knee osteoarthritis Any other disease or medication affecting the bone or cartilage. Any clinical signs or laboratory evidence diseases, which in the Investigator's opinion would preclude the participant from adhering to the Protocol or completing the trial. Other protocol defined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
